description:
"I want to sparkle too!" Kouta declares his desire to his friends, but he doesn`t know exactly how he wants to achieve this and so he consults with his friends. He tries joining the soccer team with Shunsuke, being a library assistant with Ryo, observing the archery club with Seiichirou, and making food with Yuu, but nothing seems to go right. With failure after failure Kouta finally comes to a conclusion. Just what has he decided?
Source: crunchyroll
